body.name: ODK 40 Inch Small Computer Desk with 3 Drawer and USB Charging Port & Power Outlet, Office Desk with LED Light, Home Office Desk with Monitor Stand, Modern Work Writing Study Table for Bedroom, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 17 hrs 33 mins
features: 【USB Charging Ports & Power Outlets】The computer desk is equipped with 2 power outlets and 2 USB charging ports for your electronic devices, you can easily and conveniently charge your smart phone, gaming gear or Bluetooth devices when you are working or playing games. A versatile hook provides additional storage space for your convenience.

【Desk with Drawers & Monitor Stand】The home office desk has 3 large capacity fabric drawers, keeping your office or study supplies in order and dust-free. The 3-gear monitor stand (3.2"、4.3"、5.5") provides an ergonomic view angle for people of different heights in different use environments. The monitor stand is also removable without screw holes left on the desktop.

【Gaming Desk with Colorful LED Lights】This gaming desk features LED strip that contains 10 static colors, 6 brightness grades, 10 dynamic modes and memory function with switching controls. Adjusting to the proper lighting can reduce eye strain, improve focus, and create a comfortable workspace/gaming space.

【Perfect Size, Sturdy & Durable】The writing desk's desktop size of 19.7"(D) x 39.4"(W) x 31+3.2"/4.3"/5.5"(H), providing good visual proportion and legroom, fits laptops, office and study supplies, and more. Made of metal legs and wood desktop, this desk ensures stability and a high bearing capacity. Foot mats prevent scratching the ground and ensure balance.

【Easy Assembly & Excellent Customer Service】The study table comes with detailed instructions and all parts are clearly labeled for easy assembly, what you need to do is following instructions step-by-step. If your ODK desk arrives damaged, missing parts, or scratched, our professional customer support team will help you solve the problem within 24 hours.

【Stylish & Practical】A clean and simple look that fits just about anywhere. Modern office desk is suitable for study room, bedroom, living room, game room, children's room, office. The Wood desk can be used as computer desk, a study desk, a gaming computer desk, an office table, a work desk, a home desk, a workstation. The large space and comfortable study table design allow you to complete whatever you want at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size and good quality.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this desk for a homework desk for my daughter. It’s good quality and sturdy. The lights are super cute and it was relatively easy to assemble. The drawers are a good size and can easily fit everything we use for her homework projects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to put together.
reviews.reviewText: Updated my home office space and couldn't be more happy with this purchase. Everything I wanted/needed from size, space, lighting... Would recommend this desk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for our kids church sound booth area. Pretty stable. The drawers are a little flimsy, but still work really great! Love the two levels, the top built in charging station as well as the color changing lights!! No complaints! Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This desk was quite easy to put together by myself. I would suggest that two people assemble it, but it can be done by one person. It is a large desk, that can fit two monitors on a monitor stand that is adjustable and the drawers are quite large. It is a beautiful desk too, although it's a little low for my office chair to fit comfortably under.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly the Right Size!
reviews.reviewText: As you can guess from my photos, my office is now also a nursery. I have very limited space in my house and this desk was the perfect size and solution to save room while still providing enough working space. The 40” version was narrower and less deep than the full size office desk it replaced but I could still fit my whole PC set up.Pros:-Size is perfect. This is the main selling point-Drawers. The three drawers are perfect for pens, cables, staplers and other desk items.-The added features like outlets and usb make this a very usable piece of furniture-LEDs just make me happy :)Cons:-There just is not enough depth to the top shelf to put a monitor if it is using the stock monitor stand.-Additionally, I tried putting my monitors with the stock stands on the top and it’s also too tall in that configuration. I’m 5.10” and was looking up at an uncomfortable angle. You wouldn’t know that just reading the specs but it really doesn’t work-You have to buy a monitor stand that clamps on and is height adjustable to fix all the above problems and create enough space for things like speakers. This addition makes this desk a five star product but it is an added purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great starter desk for teen
reviews.reviewText: My 17 year old daughter loves this desk. The drawers are like that fold out cloth covered hard sides stuff you buy for storage bins, but they are not flimsy. Very sturdy and appealing to the eye. I’m happy with it and would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: We needed a desk for our college age granddaughter’s room here in our home. She stays with us during the week, and this was perfect. It fits well in the space, and she loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Received desk in good package condition. Assembled with no issues tools and extra fasteners included. Very happy with product.
